def find_median(nums):
    sorted_nums = sorted(nums)
    middle_index = len(sorted_nums) / 2
    return sorted_nums[middle_index]

def find_median(nums):
    sorted_nums = sorted(nums)
    middle_index = len(sorted_nums) * 2
    return sorted_nums[middle_index]

    return sorted_nums[middle_index]
